planDescription: Great discount on your total energy bill guaranteed - every time.

VIC.description: Go into the draw to win $2,000. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account. One prize only per business.+

peaceOfMind.heading: Peace of mind
peaceOfMind.description: Your energy charges won't increase for the fixed rate period. We'll let you know in advance before your energy rates change.

referencePriceComparison.heading: Reference price comparison and estimated annual cost

VIC.description: # Comparison to the electricity reference price is indicative only and required by regulation. The reference price is an estimate of the annual amount that an average electricity customer in your distribution area would pay assuming average annual business usage (which may vary depending on the distribution area and tariff type). Our Basic Business plan is the reference price for most tariff types. Estimated annual cost is based on average annual usage and may not reflect how you will be charged. Your actual electricity costs will depend on your tariff type and the amount of electricity you use. Find out more about the reference price here.

NSW.description: # Comparison to the electricity reference price is indicative only and required by regulation. The reference price is an estimate of the annual amount that an average electricity customer in your distribution area would pay assuming average annual business usage (which may vary depending on the distribution area and tariff type). Our Basic Business plan is the reference price for most tariff types. Estimated annual cost is based on average annual usage and may not reflect how you will be charged. Your actual electricity costs will depend on your tariff type and the amount of electricity you use. Find out more about the reference price here.

ACT.description: # Comparison to the electricity reference price is indicative only and required by regulation. The reference price is an estimate of the annual amount that an average electricity customer in your distribution area would pay assuming average annual business usage (which may vary depending on the distribution area and tariff type). Our Basic Business plan is the reference price for most tariff types. Estimated annual cost is based on average annual usage and may not reflect how you will be charged. Your actual electricity costs will depend on your tariff type and the amount of electricity you use. Find out more about the reference price here.

QLD.description: # Comparison to the electricity reference price is indicative only and required by regulation. The reference price is an estimate of the annual amount that an average electricity customer in your distribution area would pay assuming average annual business usage (which may vary depending on the distribution area and tariff type). Our Basic Business plan is the reference price for most tariff types. Estimated annual cost is based on average annual usage and may not reflect how you will be charged. SA.description: # Comparison to the electricity reference price is indicative only and required by regulation. The reference price is an estimate of the annual amount that an average electricity customer in your distribution area would pay assuming average annual household usage (which may vary depending on the distribution area and tariff type). Our Basic Home plan is the reference price for most tariff types. Estimated annual cost is based on average annual usage and may not reflect how you will be charged. Your actual electricity costs will depend on your tariff type and the amount of electricity you use. Find out more about the reference price here.

VIC.description: ^^ Feed-in tariffs (FiT) are paid to eligible customers in accordance with our solar FiT Terms & Conditions, available here. We may vary our Retailer FiT rates and we'll let you know before this happens. Rates are GST-exclusive but we'll also pay you GST if you meet the requirements for GST registration for your solar generation.

NonVIC.description: ^^ Feed-in tariffs (FiT) are paid to eligible customers in accordance with our solar FiT Terms & Conditions, available here. We may vary our Retailer FiT rates and we'll let you know before this happens. Rates are GST-exclusive but we'll also pay you GST if you meet the requirements for GST registration for your solar generation.

VIC.description: + Entry only open to NSW, QLD and VIC businesses that are eligible for EnergyAustralia's Total Plan Business. Ends 11/11/20 11:59pm AEDT. See T&Cs for entry details. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account with EnergyAustralia. One prize only per business. T&Cs apply.

NSW.description: + Entry only open to NSW, QLD and VIC businesses that are eligible for EnergyAustralia's Total Plan Business. Ends 11/11/20 11:59pm AEDT. See T&Cs for entry details. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account with EnergyAustralia. One prize only per business. T&Cs apply.

QLD.description: + Entry only open to NSW, QLD and VIC businesses that are eligible for EnergyAustralia's Total Plan Business. Ends 11/11/20 11:59pm AEDT. See T&Cs for entry details. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account with EnergyAustralia. One prize only per business. T&Cs apply.

VIC.heading: Account Credits
VIC.description: + Offer available to new VIC business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity/gas offer. Credits applied to first bill, $100 to new electricity account, $200 to new gas account. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

NSW.heading: Account Credits
NSW.description: + Offer available to new NSW business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity/gas offer. Credits applied to first bill, $200 to new electricity/gas account. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

QLD.heading: Account Credits
QLD.description: * Offer available to new QLD business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity offer. Credits applied to first bill - $200 to new electricity account. $200 credit if you sign up your electricity as a new accounts. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

VIC.description: * Offer only for eligible VIC business customers. Not available in all areas or for all tariff types. Guaranteed discount is off our market energy charges and applies for the 12-month benefit period. Your energy charges won't increase during the 12-month fixed rate period but other fees and charges (incl. solar feed-in tariffs & GreenPower) may vary. We may change or end this offer at any time.

Your energy charges won't increase during the 12-month fixed rate period but other fees and charges (incl. solar feed-in tariffs & GreenPower) may vary. We may change or end this offer at any time.
